/*
 * CC42-Reinfected-ARAN03.cpp
 *
 *  Created on: 17-Apr-2012
 *      Author: Rishi
 */
#include <iostream>
int main () {
	int testcases;
	std::cin>>testcases;
	int number, temp, sum;

	while (testcases--) {
		std::cin>>number;

		if (number == 0) {
			std::cout<<0<<std::endl;
			continue;
		}

		temp =number;
		sum =0;
		while (temp) {
			sum+= (temp %10);
			temp/=10;
		}
		std::cout<<number % sum<<std::endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
